document.full_text: a song outlines the pros and cons of hydraulic fracturing, the drilling technique that has unlocked vast new reserves of natural gas but has come under sharp scrutiny for its potential to contaminate water and cause other environmental harm.
document.title: the fracking debate, to a funk beat
lines_and_colors: a song outlines the pros and cons of hydraulic fracturing, the drilling technique that has unlocked vast new reserves of natural gas but has come under sharp scrutiny for its potential to contaminate water and cause other environmental harm.
